He's going to eat Rick's other hand next issue!

I think eventually Rick will die as Kirkman is said nobody is really safe and I think Carl will become a bad ass leader.  I mean look at the character development for Carl, look at what he has experienced.  Kid's firing guns at 8 years old, has been shot twice by what 11 years old.  Slowly becoming fearless.  Will have had Rick his teacher.  This is the only comic series I have read every issue and I have read each one twice now.  I haven't gotten past more than 10 issues in a row in any other series.  I'm not an avid comic reader but nothing has come close to this comic series.

I'd like to see an invasion from a foreign country that wasn't infected ....like China or Saudi Arabia ....then the shit really hits the fan as they fight for survival against the Undead AND invaders ! But what the Invaders don't know is how formidable the undead can be. And how they too are now infected now that they are in the United States. Ricks team (Much smaller) watches a whole new breed of Zombies being introduced from all the cocky invaders. Then ......a transmission from Australia ! They have a CURE ! and the island is safe ! ....But How will they get there ? .....Turmoil on the seas ....
